title: Book of the Weeping Prophet (Saga of the Sons, #2).
description: Jaden never meant to start the apocalypse.He only wanted to save himself from the curse of Abraham. Everything changed the night he found the egg. He was forced to abandon all his wonderful spring break plans to embark on a dangerous quest to find the Holy Grail. It was very unfortunate because all he wanted to do was stay up late playing Fortenite, swim in the forbidden Shiver lake, eat unlimited waffles at the Waffle House, and dance with the girl of his dreams at Cascadeâ€™s.But nope. All of that cancelled.The life of an Anointed warrior is never easy. Plunge into the second adventure of the bestselling Saga of the Sons series and continue the journey into a dark world where Hip-Hop meets the Supernatural
author: J. Moon
